alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:09PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Juab and southwestern Utah Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 309 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Nephi, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Payson, Nephi, Santaquin, Salem, Elk Ridge, Woodland Hills, Rocky Ridge, Spring Lake, Elberta, West Mountain, Mona, Genola and Goshen. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 226 and 250. US Route 6 between mile markers 142 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Western Millard and Juab Counties
